entries.title: Refugees sent to Rwanda from remote UK island speak to BBC
entries.description: The migrants, who the UN says are refugees, say they feel isolated and unsafe in the African country.

entries.title: Hunter Biden's ex-girlfriend 'panicked' after finding gun
entries.description: In an emotional testimony, Hallie Biden recalled being introduced to crack cocaine by Hunter Biden.

entries.title: The right could win big in Europe – thanks to young people
entries.description: With the voting age lowered to 16 in some parts of the EU, politicians are targeting the youth vote.

entries.title: US urges Israel to be transparent over Gaza school strike
entries.description: Israel says it killed at least nine militants but the deaths of 14 children are also being reported.

entries.title: The devastating cost of fighting Myanmar's military dictatorship
entries.description: The BBC hears allegations of rape and torture by Myanmar's military in Chin State.

entries.title: Australia's 'Space Gandalf' astronomer dies aged 62

entries.title: EU elections start with tight Dutch race - exit poll
entries.description: As 27 EU countries vote over four days, exit polls suggest a narrow defeat for the Dutch far right.

entries.title: Trump fans brave blazing Arizona heat to attend event
entries.description: Multiple people were taken to hospital for heat-related illness, as Phoenix saw its hottest day in 2024.

entries.title: Biden links WW2 and Ukraine war in D-Day address

entries.title: Why scientists are studying whales with a crossbow
entries.description: Researchers use the device to take remote biopsies from wild humpback whales to monitor their health.

entries.title: At least 150 villagers feared dead in Sudan massacre

entries.title: Ex-Trump strategist Bannon ordered to prison

entries.title: Russia holds Frenchman accused of military spying

entries.title: Eleven tonnes of rubbish taken off Himalayan peaks
entries.description: Four corpses and one skeleton were also removed from Everest and other peaks during an annual clean-up.

entries.title: Hiker finds pipe feeding China's tallest waterfall

entries.title: WW2 veteran aged 102 dies on way to D-Day event
entries.description: Robert "Al" Persichitti, who served with the Navy in Japan, became ill on his way to Normandy.

entries.title: 'Wanna feed the giraffe?' Moment toddler grabbed from truck

entries.title: Astronauts in Boeing capsule arrive at space station
entries.description: Nasa’s Suni Williams and Butch Wilmore were welcomed with hugs and applause, after docking successfully.

entries.title: ‘Cold lava’ floods Philippines village after eruption

entries.title: What worked for India's Modi - and what didn’t?

entries.title: Son's funny faces overshadow lawmaker's House speech

entries.title: Americans react to Trump's guilty conviction

entries.title: Trump would run for president from jail, his lawyer says
entries.description: Alina Habba says Donald Trump will run for office even if he is jailed and "nothing will change" following his conviction for falsifying business records.

entries.title: ‘Aposiopesis’: Watch 12-year-old win US Spelling Bee

entries.title: Mesmerising lava rivers as Icelandic volcano erupts
entries.description: Lava continues to spurt from from a volcanic system in Reykjanes Peninsula, after Wednesday's powerful eruption.

entries.title: District Attorney on Trump verdict: ‘I did my job’
